bibl.title: New Texts from the al-Hayz Oasis: A Preliminary Report.

series.title: Recherches et Rencontres. Publications de la Faculté des Lettres de Genève.

bibl.note: Excavations of a Czech multidisciplinary team in the southern-most part of the Bahriyah Oasis, 2003-. - Prologue. - Bir Showish. - Ostraca Bir Showish. Preliminary edition of two pieces (Vth cent.): Inv. 16/BS/07-3. Delivery of chicken and eggs; - Inv. 244/BS/07 + 45/BS/07. Delivery of cotton. - Some observations on local agriculture and administration. - Christianity. - Epilogue.

bibl.title: Actes du 26e Congrès international de papyrologie. Genève, 16-21 août 2010.
